front.title: Flag-based MPLS Network Actions (MNA) for On-Path Telemetry

abstract.t: This document describes the support of two flag-based variants of on- path Telemetry techniques, Postcard-Based On-Path Telemetry (PBT) and Alternate Marking (AM), as MPLS Network Actions (MNA)for OAM in MPLS networks. The scheme only uses a few bits in the MNA header opcode dedicated for the flag-based actions.
